outputDir.description: Directory where to store built files.

styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

includePaths.description: The paths to include. Paths will be resolved to workspace root.

docsMode.description: Build a documentation-only site using addon-docs.

configDir.description: Directory where to load Storybook configurations from.

loglevel.description: Controls level of logging during build. Can be one of: [silly, verbose, info (default), warn, error, silent].

docs.description: Starts Storybook in documentation mode. Learn more about it : https://storybook.js.org/docs/react/writing-docs/build-documentation#preview-storybooks-documentation.

webpackStatsJson.description: Write Webpack Stats JSON to disk.

debugWebpack.description: Display final webpack configurations for debugging purposes.

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.
